text:
Page Two
Career Fellows
* William W. Keifer, 39, Hartford, Connecticut
* Jim Lehrer, 34, Dallas, Texas
* Willie J. Martin, 31, Jacksonville, Florida
* Ramon Merlos, 28, East Lansing, Michigan
* Rosanna Joy Quinn, 26, Memphis, Tennessee
* William C. Thompson, 30, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
* James Val, 25, Los Angeles, California
* William Wilson, 23, Lexington, Kentucky
* Theodore Wing, 22, Syracuse, New York
The seminar will brief the Career Fellows on public broad
casting structures, operations, and programming, both in television
or radio.
After the seminar is concluded the Fellows will report to
the stations which have sponsored them as condidates for the Fellow
ships (see attached folder).
Work sessions in the seminar will be conducted by the
following public broadcasting executives:
* Dr. Frederick Breitenfeld, Executive Director of the
Maryland Center for Public Broadcasting.
* Lloyd Kaiser, General Manager of WITF-TV, Hershey,
Pennsylvania
(MORE)
